deleteProjectMessageDescription: Are you sure of deleting your project? After you delete it, users cannot view your project.
deleteRequestMessageDescription: Are you sure of deleting your request?
archiveProjectMessage1: Are you sure of archiving your project?
archiveProjectMessage2: After clicking on 'Yes' item, you cannot activate it.
pauseProjectMessage1: Are you sure of stopping your project?
pauseProjectMessage2: You can activate it again and then receive donations.
projectPendingDes: Your project is being reviewed by the admin.
requestPendingDes: Your request is being reviewed by the admin.
projectRejectedDes: Your project was rejected for violating the rules. You can edit your project and resend it to us by clicking on the revision request option. You can also contact us from the support section.
requestRejectedDes: Your request was rejected for violating the rules. You can edit your project and resend it to us by clicking on the revision request option. You can also contact us from the support section.
activeDes: Your project has been published and you can stop or archive it, when necessary.
pausedDes: Your project has been published and you can stop or archive it, when necessary.
archiveDes: Your project has been completed and it is no longer possible for users to donate to it.
shareHintDesc: در پروژه شما در حال حاضر مشارکتی وجود ندارد، پیشنهاد می گردد برای جذب مشارکت از طریق گزینه اشتراک گذاری، پروژه خود را به سایر دوستان خود معرفی نمایید.
